method: Preheat the oven to 190C/375F/Gas 5. Score each apple around the middle using a sharp knife.  Place the apples into an ovenproof dish and roast in the oven for 45-50 minutes, or until the apples have softened and the skins are beginning to split. Meanwhile, heat the beer or cider in a saucepan over a low heat. Add the spices, stir well, and continue to heat through until the surface of the liquid starts to foam. Add the lemon slices and roasted apples, then serve.
